name: Valet Pro
description:
Sometimes when someone calls sick to work there is no replacement. In the world of valet car parking there is one hero, The Valet Pro.

As the one true Valet Pro you will venture to several unique locations covering sick leave and park cars for discerning customers. We understand that vehicle damage can occur on the job, so when this happens only a small deduction from your wages will suffice. Only one person can park these vehicles for a minimum wage, and that is you, get to work!

Features

-Simple and easy to master controls.

-7 Unique locations from five-star hotels to some random dudes’ garage.

-9 punchy musical tracks.

-Multiple dangerous health and safety hazards!

-Gold stars stickers incentives for not damaging vehicles.
